user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for quality and reliable sports socks for my child, as well as finding a comfortable and well-fitting sock for myself.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a reliable sock for my child to use during soccer games, believing that a well-known brand would provide quality and durability. However, the product failed to meet my expectations as it ripped on the first use, leading to disappointment and questioning the brand's reputation.

I needed a no-show sock that would fit well and stay in place, as I often struggle to find the right size. The positive attributes of the product, such as its fit and quality, were crucial in my decision, and I felt satisfied with my choice after trying it on.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are well-made, comfortable, and offer good value for money. I appreciate items that are durable, easy to care for, and maintain their quality after washing. I tend to favor clothing that fits well and enhances my appearance, even in casual settings. Additionally, I value products that provide specific functional benefits, such as moisture-wicking properties or seamless designs that enhance comfort. On the other hand, I dislike items that run small or have inconsistent sizing, as well as those that show signs of wear quickly or are of poor quality. I also find it frustrating when products do not perform as expected, especially in terms of fit and comfort during physical activities.

conversation.content: I want to find quality and reliable sports socks for my child, as well as a comfortable and well-fitting sock for myself. within my expected price range: [11.5, 17.0]
What specific sport or activity does your child engage in to ensure the sports socks are suitable for their needs?
My child plays soccer, so I need sports socks that are suitable for soccer games.
What specific features are you looking for in sports socks for your child playing soccer and in comfortable socks for yourself?

For my child's soccer games, I need sports socks that are durable, moisture-wicking, and offer good support during intense activities. As for myself, I'm looking for comfortable socks that fit well, stay in place, and are made of quality materials. I prefer socks that are easy to care for and maintain their shape after washing.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Soccer Socks Athletic Sports Socks Softball Baseball Cushioned Knee High Tube Socks Kids Teens Women Men Unisex> / Item ID: B0C39CT3QB / Price: $14.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Socks & Hosiery', 'Socks'] / Description: ["Athletic Sports Socks for Unisex Soccer Socks, Team Sports Socks with Cushion for Youth to Adult 3 Pair and 9 Pair Pack. Take the field by storm in these Unisex Soccer Socks. Whether you're on the soccer or rugby field, these acrylic tube socks. These are slightly stretchy socks. Order these 3 pairs or 9 pairs today and you will have your sports socks for the rest of the season! FACTORY DIRECT SELLER. Find your team color. Available Colors: White, Black, Pink, Light Pink, Red, Navy, Royal Blue, Burgundy, Hunter Green, Neon Green, Orange, Purple, Yellow, turquoise and more. Contents: 80% Acrylic, 17% Polyester, 3% Spandex. Machine washable. Size Guidelines: X-Small: Youth-Kids (Sock Size 5-7, Shoe Size Children 3-10 Youth) / Small: Junior Teens (Sock Size 7-9, Shoe Size Children 9-13.5, Adult 1-5) / Medium: Women (Sock Size 9-11, Shoe Size 6-9 Women) / Large: Men (Sock Size 10-13, Shoe Size 8-12 Men)."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <adidas Copa Zone Cushion 4 Soccer Socks (1-Pair) for Men, Women, Boys and Girls> / Item ID: B0C3KSFZ6J / Price: $11.95 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Athletic Socks'] / Description: ["Built for soccer players, these socks have a classic over-the-calf design with knit-in 3-stripes. they're made of moisture-wicking yarn to help feet stay dry, and have double-welt cuff construction for durability and a snug, stay-put fit. targeted cushioning at the heel and toe absorbs impact."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <adidas Copa Zone Cushion III Soccer Socks (1-Pair)> / Item ID: B076PCB5RN / Price: $11.95 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Athletic Socks'] / Description: ['The new and improved copa zone cushion otc sock is the go-to soccer sock of choice for all levels of players. the updated footbed features targeted cushioning at the heel and toe for better shock absorption. the new, shaped arch and ankle compression provide added stability where you need it most. the lightweight construction of the sock offers a close and comfortable fit, while the Climalite moisture wicking yarns ensure your legs and feet will stay cool and dry.']
